org.wikidata.wdtk.client

Class ClientConfiguration

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.wikidata.wdtk.client.ClientConfiguration

  • public class ClientConfiguration
extends Object
    This class handles the program arguments from the conversion command line tool.
    Author:
    Michael GÃ¼nther, Markus Kroetzsch

      Short command-line alternative to OPTION_OUTPUT_COMPRESSION.
      static String CMD_OPTION_OUTPUT_DESTINATION
      Short command-line alternative to OPTION_OUTPUT_DESTINATION.
      static String CMD_OPTION_OUTPUT_STDOUT
      Short command-line alternative to OPTION_OUTPUT_STDOUT.
      static String CMD_OPTION_QUIET
      Short command-line alternative to OPTION_QUIET.
      static String OPTION_ACTION
      Name of the long command line option for selecting an action that should be performed.
      static String OPTION_CONFIG_FILE
      Name of the long command line option for specifying the location of the configuration file.
      static String OPTION_CREATE_REPORT
      Name of the long command line option to create a report file about the files produced by DumpProcessingOutputActions.
      static String OPTION_DUMP_LOCATION
      Name of the long command line option and configuration file field for specifying the base location of the dump files to use.
      static String OPTION_FILTER_LANGUAGES
      Name of the long command line option and configuration file field for specifying the language filters.
      static String OPTION_FILTER_PROPERTIES
      Name of the long command line option and configuration file field for specifying the property filters.
      static String OPTION_FILTER_SITES
      Name of the long command line option and configuration file field for specifying the site link filters.
      static String OPTION_HELP
      Name of the long command line option for printing the help text.
      static String OPTION_LOCAL_DUMPFILE
      Name of the long command line option and configuration file field for defining the path to a local dump file.
      static String OPTION_OFFLINE_MODE
      Name of the long command line option and configuration file field for switching to offline mode.
      static String OPTION_OUTPUT_COMPRESSION
      Name of the long command line option and configuration file field for specifying the compression to use for the output.
      static String OPTION_OUTPUT_DESTINATION
      Name of the long command line option and configuration file field for defining the destination (usually output file name) of actions that produce output.
      static String OPTION_OUTPUT_RDF_TYPE
      Name of the long command line option and configuration file field for specifying the tasks for RDF serialization.
      static String OPTION_OUTPUT_STDOUT
      Name of the long command line option and configuration file field for directing output to stdout.
      static String OPTION_QUIET
      Name of the long command line option and configuration file field for requesting that no messages are logged to stdout.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ClientConfiguration(String[] args)
      Constructs a new object for the given arguments.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      List<DumpProcessingAction> getActions()
      Returns the list of actions defined for this object.
      String getDumpDirectoryLocation()
      Returns the location of the directory where downloaded dump files are stored, or null if the default is to be used.
      Set<String> getFilterLanguages()
      Returns a set of language codes that should be used as a filter, or null if no filter is set.
      Set<PropertyIdValue> getFilterProperties()
      Returns a set of property ids that should be used as a filter for statements, or null if no filter is set.
      Set<String> getFilterSiteKeys()
      Returns a set of site keys that should be used as a filter for site links, or null if no filter is set.
      String getInputDumpLocation()
      Returns the string path to a dump file that should be processed.
      MwLocalDumpFile getLocalDumpFile()
      Returns a local dump file that was previously downloaded and should be locally processed, or null if no local dump file is set.
      boolean getOfflineMode()
      Returns true if all operations should be performed in offline mode, without accessing the Internet.
      String getReportFileName()
      Returns the output destination where a report file should be created.
      boolean isQuiet()
      Returns true if the application should not write anything to stdout.
      void printHelp()
      Prints a help text to the console.

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

        public static final String OPTION_ACTION
        Name of the long command line option for selecting an action that should be performed. Available actions are registered in the field KNOWN_ACTIONS.

    • Constructor Detail

      • ClientConfiguration

        public ClientConfiguration(String[] args)
        Constructs a new object for the given arguments.
        Parameters:
        args - command-line arguments

    • Method Detail

      • getActions

        public List<DumpProcessingAction> getActions()
        Returns the list of actions defined for this object.
        Returns:
        list of actions

      • getDumpDirectoryLocation

        public String getDumpDirectoryLocation()
        Returns the location of the directory where downloaded dump files are stored, or null if the default is to be used.
        Returns:
        string path to dump file directory

      • getOfflineMode

        public boolean getOfflineMode()
        Returns true if all operations should be performed in offline mode, without accessing the Internet.
        Returns:
        true if in offline mode

      • isQuiet

        public boolean isQuiet()
        Returns true if the application should not write anything to stdout. This can be set explicitly or indirectly if one of the actions wants to write to stdout.
        Returns:
        true if the application should not log messages to stdout

      • getReportFileName

        public String getReportFileName()
        Returns the output destination where a report file should be created. If the client should not create such a file the function will return null.
        Returns:
        report filename

      • getFilterLanguages

        public Set<String> getFilterLanguages()
        Returns a set of language codes that should be used as a filter, or null if no filter is set. An empty set means that all languages should be filtered.
        Returns:
        language filter

      • getFilterSiteKeys

        public Set<String> getFilterSiteKeys()
        Returns a set of site keys that should be used as a filter for site links, or null if no filter is set. An empty set means that all site links should be filtered.
        Returns:
        site key filter

      • getFilterProperties

        public Set<PropertyIdValue> getFilterProperties()
        Returns a set of property ids that should be used as a filter for statements, or null if no filter is set. An empty set means that all statements should be filtered.
        Returns:
        property filter

      • getInputDumpLocation

        public String getInputDumpLocation()
        Returns the string path to a dump file that should be processed.
        Returns:
        string path to file

      • getLocalDumpFile

        public MwLocalDumpFile getLocalDumpFile()
        Returns a local dump file that was previously downloaded and should be locally processed, or null if no local dump file is set.

        The dump file object will be created based on the current configuration.

        Returns:
        dump file that should be locally processed

      • printHelp

        public void printHelp()
        Prints a help text to the console.
